name: field-kit
description: Utilities to effectively manage text entry on the web.

scripts.test: npm run-script build && jasmine-node --coffee spec/helpers spec
scripts.package: npm run-script test && gluejs --basepath lib --include . --out ../field-kit.js --global FieldKit && uglifyjs field-kit.js --mangle > field-kit.min.js

author: Square
